subject: Wire SMS delivery nodes in Job Reminder and Review Request workflows
description:
Added SMS delivery pipeline to both workflows via n8n_update_partial_workflow:

Job Reminder (knB3ZyreIIQwZh9k) - 6 operations:
- `build_delivery_payload` code node: calls buildRewstDeliveryPayload() with action send_job_reminders
- `check_has_delivery` IF node: routes on hasDelivery boolean
- `deliver_to_rewst` HTTP Request: POSTs to rewst-n8n-redirect-wrapper with gateway headers
- 3 connections: enrich_with_customer_data -> build_delivery_payload -> check_has_delivery -> deliver_to_rewst

Review Request (07ki4WkQol61XZPQ) - 6 operations:
- `build_review_payload` code node: calls buildRewstReviewPayload() with action send_review_requests
- `check_has_reviews` IF node: routes on hasReviews boolean
- `deliver_to_rewst` HTTP Request: POSTs to rewst-n8n-redirect-wrapper with gateway headers
- 3 connections: format_completed_jobs -> build_review_payload -> check_has_reviews -> deliver_to_rewst

Evidence: `tasks.md:25-35` - all 8 tasks (4.1-4.4, 5.1-5.4) marked [x]
